title: Sheep 8
warning_no_rom: ROM moko te esalemi. Kobanda emulation ekoki te.
info_stopped: Emulation esili. Senga kokanga fenêtre ya jeu soki esengeli.
warning_no_rom_reset: ROM moko te esalemi. Kozongisa ekoki te.
settings_msg: Mikano ya kosala ezali te sik’oyo. Zela soki ba update eya!
help_msg:
Boyei na Sheep 8!

Po na kobanda emulation, fungola ROM na menu ya Fichier.
Salela menu ya Control po na kobanda to kokanga emulation.
Okoki mpe kosalela toolbar.
about_msg:
Sheep 8 - Emulateur CHIP-8

Basali: 2LazyCoffee2 na TortipOOF
Beta version 1.1.1
Soki olingi koyeba mingi, tala GitHub.
no_roms_in_folder: ROM .ch8 moko te emonani na dossier. Tala dossier to biloko na kati.
name: Kombo
framerate:
Mbangu ya emulation (misala na sekonde) 
 Par défaut: 500 Hz | Tyá -1 po na te kozala na limite
fullscreen_on_start: Bandela ba jeux na ekran mobimba
toolbar_layout_left: Ba icon mike na ngámbo ya mwasi
toolbar_layout_top: Ba icon ya kati na likolo
help_chip8keys:
Clavier ya CHIP-8 ezali na ba touches 4x4,
plan ezali na elili ya ngámbo ya mobali.
help_chip8tokeyboard: Ba touches wana ezali na 1234/AZER/QSDF/WXCV na emulator.
help_morekeys: Po na koyeba mingi, tala documentation na GitHub.
about_desc:
Emulateur CHIP-8 esalemi na 2LazyCoffee2 na TortipOOF
na projet ya Polytech Dijon.

Releases: https://github.com/2LazyCoffee2/Python_Project/releases
Documentation: https://github.com/2LazyCoffee2/Python_Project/wiki
Logiciel oyo ezali open-source. Soki olingi koyeba mingi, kotuna biso.
fullscreen_info: Emulation esengeli ebandi mpo fullscreen esala.
